A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't listen to all the negativity from these \"hard-core\" fans that are just too nostalgic with the old that can't cope with moving forward. Rian Johnson makes a risky turn in this movie breaking with what was expected for this movie. The answers to the questions that TFA created are not the ones that we were theorizing about\, however they still deliver and move the plot forward. Enough with the old and predictable. Episode IX should be a masterpiece as this one is.
